committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 6/16/1988--Introduced. Producer Payment Relief Act of 1988 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to waive the collection of advance deficiency payments made to certain producers of the 1988 wheat and feed grain crops in counties designated as disaster areas because of drought or other natural disaster.
